summary: Elven Arrows legitimately remasted in glorious 4k and 2k
descriptionHtml:
[font=Arial][color=#f1c232][size=6][center]﻿[/center][/size][/color][/font][center][font=Arial][color=#f1c232][size=6]E[/size][/color][size=5]lven [/size][color=#f1c232][size=6]A[/size][/color][size=5]rrows [/size][size=2]& [/size][color=#f1c232][size=6]Q[/size][/color][size=5]uiver [/size][color=#f1c232][size=6]R[/size][/color][/font][b][font=Arial][size=5]evamped[/size][/font][/b][b][size=5]﻿[/size][/b][/center][b][size=5]

[/size][/b][color=#f1c232][size=6][b]U[/b][/size][/color][b]pdates: [/b]
[b]                  17/06/18 - Enjoy :)
﻿ ﻿   ﻿
[/b]
[b]                               [/b][i]
[/i][color=#1e84cc][font=Courier New][size=4][b][i]If you enjoy my work please endorse to let others know.[/i][/b][/size][/font][/color]


[b][color=#f1c232][size=6]D[/size][/color]escription:[/b]
[b]I honestly am confused by the texture artists of Skyrim. Like how do they justify mushy, splotches with a few scant scribblings of details as textures??[/b]
[b]It literally gets to me that bad that I honestly forced myself to learn how to texture just so I didn't have to endure the eyesores in-game................And here we are today. Enjoy some newly textured Elven Arrows in glorious 4k (and 2k) [/b]
[size=2][b]By god this took many, many hours to achieve. But totally worth the outcome. So satisfying seeing textures resolved in 4k detail.[/b][/size]
[b]Why Bethesda didn't actually remaster any of the textures when they "remastered" Skryim is beyond me.[/b]
[b]This retexture keeps close-ish to the vanilla aesthetic to help keep your game lore friendly. LORE FRIENDLINESS IS KEY MY FRIENDS! :) Well I think it is.....[/b]


[b]I am uploading and sharing this mod as I have been an avid skyrim player for years, using hundreds (more like thousands) of mods. So it's time I continue giving back to this awesome community.[/b]
[b]This is a replacer.[/b]


[b]Versions include:[/b]
[b]-4k Elven Quiver and Arrows[/b]
[b]-2k Elven Quiver and Arrows[/b]

﻿
[b][color=#f1c232]I[/color][b][size=2]nstallation:[/size][/b][/b]
[b]Download and install with NMM/MO/Vortex, otherwise place in data folder.[/b]




[color=#f1c232][size=6][b]F[/b][/size][/color][b]AQ[/b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/12371]

[/url][b]Why are the colours so bright and saturated?[/b]
[size=2]It's my personal enb settings. Depending on your setup the colour intensity will vary.[/size]
[size=2]However when creating my retextures I aimed for a balanced level of saturation/brightness.[/size]

[b]Can you add a version with this coloured feathers/wood/leather?[/b]
[size=2]If there is enough interest[/size]

[b]I hate your retextures![/b]
[size=2]Congratulations.You have an opinion. Feel free to not download my mod and move on [/size]

[b]There's no need to have 4k textures[/b]
[size=2]What's the point of posting that?[/size]


[i]"Heim Hin Miiraad Alun Amativ"
[/i]

[b]A huge shout out to Bethesda for creating the best game series of all time![/b]
author: ThranduilElvenKind
